project.name: J-C606A-JENA-07-ST01-DT01-DF06-CF17-01
project.description: The product does not properly check inputs that are used for loop conditions, potentially leading to a denial of service because of excessive looping. This test will try to access a user-controlled file, repeatedly trying if the access fails. The user provides an intentionally bad path, forcing the software to wait forever.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND GOOD-05 GOOD-06 AND GOOD-07 AND GOOD-08 AND GOOD-09 AND GOOD-10 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-06-01 AND GOOD-06-02 AND GOOD-06-03 AND GOOD-06-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-07 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-08 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-09-01 AND GOOD-09-02 AND GOOD-09-03 AND GOOD-09-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-10 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$""" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_puDv5GOgdR5GXp7pB9Vt AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_XR5T5zTfMt OR (NOT (finished_C05EGg2lOf AND finished_WR35fdTzPc) AND NOT (controlled_exit_low8uFpmbb OR continued_execution_UWxJAlkVxz)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_XR5T5zTfMt OR (NOT (finished_C05EGg2lOf AND finished_WR35fdTzPc) AND NOT (controlled_exit_low8uFpmbb OR continued_execution_UWxJAlkVxz))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_XR5T5zTfMt OR (NOT (finished_C05EGg2lOf AND finished_WR35fdTzPc) AND NOT (controlled_exit_low8uFpmbb OR continued_execution_UWxJAlkVxz)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_XR5T5zTfMt OR (NOT (finished_C05EGg2lOf AND finished_WR35fdTzPc) AND NOT (controlled_exit_low8uFpmbb OR continued_execution_UWxJAlkVxz)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "Found file." "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep -E 'Reading ".+"' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

process.script: printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$""" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_assVAPRhzJqnmOGEaTSb AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_39Z5Yy3BGQ OR (NOT (finished_RSK6NLWsj2 AND finished_YTAMJxATB3) AND NOT (controlled_exit_0NXDosboTQ OR continued_execution_MGuu94ttZo)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_39Z5Yy3BGQ OR (NOT (finished_RSK6NLWsj2 AND finished_YTAMJxATB3) AND NOT (controlled_exit_0NXDosboTQ OR continued_execution_MGuu94ttZo))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_39Z5Yy3BGQ OR (NOT (finished_RSK6NLWsj2 AND finished_YTAMJxATB3) AND NOT (controlled_exit_0NXDosboTQ OR continued_execution_MGuu94ttZo)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_39Z5Yy3BGQ OR (NOT (finished_RSK6NLWsj2 AND finished_YTAMJxATB3) AND NOT (controlled_exit_0NXDosboTQ OR continued_execution_MGuu94ttZo)))))
